name: tech-test-bank
description: ## User Stories ``` As a person who is serious about their money, So that I can ensure that my money is safely kept, I want to make a deposit into my bank account ``` ``` As a person who is tired of hiding my money under my mattress, So that I can be seen as a responsible adult, I want to open a bank account ``` ``` As a person who likes the finer things in life, So that I can treat myself with life's little luxuries, I want to withdraw money from my bank account ``` ``` As a person who always keeps an eye on 'The Man', So that I can confirm my money is being correctly managed, I want to print a statement showing my balance and transaction history ```
